EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA A Blank Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Corian® Solid Surface: Communication regarding case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear customer,
Friendly Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} QN & Warranty Assistant Tel: {!Case.OwnerPhone} {!Case.OwnerEmail}
We want to inform you that we collect your information to identify your business interests, provide you with
products or services and offer a positive customer experience during business interactions. Your personal
information (name, e-Mail, phone number, and other contact data) will be stored in chosen customer system
s primarily hosted in the United States. This information may be shared within DuPont, its affiliates,
partners, and selected third parties in other countries for the same purpose. In order to access, amend,
delete or oppose to the processing of your information, use this link.
DuPont™ and Corian® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company
or its affiliates. The usage of logos, trademarks and registered trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and
Company must be authorized by E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or by one of its affiliated
companies.
